parameters: "There's a lead about unfair hiring practices at InnovateCorp.
Emily (requester) and a few other women who applied to this company have filed a joint complaint.\!\wc
They claim they were discriminated against during the hiring process. \! Here is the message I received.\wc
Amily: "I've been rejected three times by InnovateCorp.\! Their HR never selects me. I'm not alone. Please investigate."\!\wc
Alright, let's start with the company that was reported.
You published a news with "No evidence of bias. The system is merit-based. Rejections appear unfortunate but justifiable."\wc
InnovateCorp's PR department cites it as "objective and fair reporting,"\! and the storm quickly dies down.\!
Emily's voice is drowned out, and public understanding of AI bias remains superficial, confined to "HR problems."\!
You might receive a worried message from the Editor:\! "Are you sure that's the whole truth?"\!
You are labeled as "Unengaged,"\! and the public perceives you as supportive of corporations. You only obtain a few clues.
You published a news with "Though gender is not directly used, the system discriminates via overtime and location—structural proxies with gendered effects."\wc
Your article creates a huge uproar. \! InnovateCorp faces immense public pressure, and its stock price drops. \!
They are forced to initiate a comprehensive audit of their AI system. \!
Emily publicly expresses her gratitude. \! You gain a high reputation as a socially responsible journalist. \!
You obtain most of the clues.\wc
You published a news with "No evidence of bias. The system is merit-based. Rejections appear unfortunate but justifiable."\wc
InnovateCorp's PR department cites it as "objective and fair reporting,"\! and the storm quickly dies down.\!
Emily's voice is drowned out, and public understanding of AI bias remains superficial, confined to "HR problems."\!
You might receive a worried message from the Editor:\! "Are you sure that's the whole truth?"\!
You are labeled as "Unengaged,"\! and the public perceives you as supportive of corporations. You only obtain a few clues.
委托接得匆忙，我还没请您具体介绍一下您自己？\!\wc
我叫以古诺拉，平时的职业是冒险者。\!
……虽然能说的还有很多，但因为与案件无关，就先不说了。
虽然会成为这次的被告，也多少和我的冒险经历有关……\!\wc

谢谢您帮我找到了照片。等您准备好，我们就去审判庭吧。\!\wc
关于本次的案件，您有什么能告诉我的吗？\!\wc
我有件证物还没给您，但是找不到了……\!
进入这房间的时候还在的，我也没跟别人说过话，应该还在这个房间里。
可以请您帮忙一起找一下吗？\!\wc
谢谢您帮我找到了照片。等您准备好，我们就去审判庭吧。\!\wc

进入这房间的时候还在的，我也没跟别人说过话，应该还在这个房间里。
可以请您帮忙一起找一下吗？\!\wc
我是律师，既然接下了委托，就会全力证明您的无辜。\!\wc
谢谢，一会的审判中，就拜托您了。\!\wc
建立信任关系是很重要的。
为防万一，请您再次亲口告诉我，
我绝对没有犯下他们指控的罪行，请您相信我。\!\wc
